aircraft.value: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-8195-886 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Cabin pressurization rate anomaly. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pressurization component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 17/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 16/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 22/04/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 23/04/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
